title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS30082/HS30097Course ContentsOverview of Fixed Income Securities; Organization and Conduct of Debt Markets; Treasury Auctions and Selling Mechanism; Mathematical Analysis for Bond; Yield Curve Analysis; Fixed Income Markets and Portfolio Management: Inflation Indexed Debt Markets, Agency and Corporate Debt Markets, Securitization and Mortgage Backed Securities, Tax Exempt Debt Markets; Risk Management and Bond Market.
